title: Ormosisdotcom
author: Ormosisdotcom
content: Click here to purchase reviews for your business or visit Ormosis.com for other services[/color]Did you know that 52% of customers will not buy if a business has less than a four-star rating?☛ Read more astonishing statistics about online reviews. Positive reviews can immensely help your business. Whether you own a restaurant, a store, a studio, e-commerce or another company, we can help you increase your sales. According to studies, a one-star increase in rating can lead to a 5% to 9% increase in revenue. [Source] Why should I purchase fake reviews?We write reviews tailored to your business and your products. When purchasing from us, you can either write your own reviews or let us write them for you. Our copywriters can do research on your products/services and provide reviews that are unique and relevant to your business.Our reviews are indistinguishable from real ones. To further increase the credibility of the reviews, you can choose custom parameters such as delivery dates, gender and stars. If you don't include any preference, we will deliver the reviews with settings optimized for your target audience. Why reviews are crucial for your businessSEO-optimized reviews can improve search rankings. That is especially important for local businesses or Amazon and eBay merchants. Any business can benefit from positive reviews, as they will increase brand trust and raise conversion rates.Roughly 9% of Google’s entire search algorithm is driven by review signals like those you find on Facebook, Google or Trustpilot. These review signals focus on review velocity, quality and quantity. In other words, high-quality reviews will improve your rankings in search results.91% of shoppers trust online reviews as much as a recommendation from their friends and family. We can help you build, preserve or restore your online reputation very quickly. Let us take care of your online reputation, so you can do what you do best: making money. Which kind of reviews do you provide?We can provide positive online reviews for most websites. If it's on the internet, we can do it. Below you can find a small list of supported websites. For a complete list, please refer to the website.Google reviews (Worldwide)Tripadvisor reviews (Worldwide)Amazon reviews (.com only)GlassDoor reviews (US only)Feefo reviews (Worldwide)Expedia reviews (Worldwide)Trustpilot reviews (Worldwide)Facebook reviews (Worldwide)CustomerLobby reviews (Worldwide)Walmart reviews (US only)Yelp reviews (Worldwide)BBB reviews (US only)DisclaimerPlease note that we do not endorse scammers or fraudsters. Our service is geared towards genuine business owners struggling with negative online reviews or not having enough reviews. Everybody makes mistakes. We give existing companies a second chance and help new businesses skyrocket their growth rate.We do not sell negative reviews. We are never going to harm anyone's business - whether it's one of your competitors or your brother-in-law. You can only purchase reviews for your own business, unless you are a reseller. We accept resellers and give them superior profit margins. If you want an opportunity to make more money, we can provide you with all the tools you need. ContactsFeel free to message us using any of the contact methods listed below. Thank you.Email: hello@ormosis.comTelegram: @OrmosisBotDiscord: Ormosis#5344Live chat: ormosis.comBitcointalk users get a 10% discount on their first order. Simply post "DISCOUNT PLEASE" below and you will receive a PM containing your promo code.
